tag.title: worker image tag, defaults to Chart appVersion

resources.title: default resource limits and requests configuration for the Corda containers

limits.title: the default CPU/memory resource limits for the Corda containers

requests.title: the default CPU/memory resource request for the Corda containers

dumpHostPath.title: Path on Kubernetes hosts to mount on Corda workers for collecting dumps

heapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError.title: Enables capturing JVM heap dumps from Corda workers on an OutOfMemory error

enabled.title: enables the Open Telemetry Java agent for the Corda workers

endpoint.title: the Open Telemetry endpoint to use e.g https://otel.example.com:4317; telemetry will be logged locally if this is unset

protocol.title: the Open Telemetry protocol the endpoint is using

nodeSelector.title: node labels for pod assignment, see https://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/node-selection/

database.title: the name of the cluster database

password.title: the cluster database password (ignored if existingSecret is set, otherwise required)

existingSecret.title: the name of an existing secret containing the cluster database password with a key of 'password'

registry.title: registry for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

repository.title: repository for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

tag.title: tag for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

bootstrapServers.title: comma-separated list of Kafka bootstrap servers

topicPrefix.title: prefix to use for Kafka topic names (to support the use of a single Kafka cluster by multiple Corda clusters)

tls.title: TLS configuration for client connections to Kafka

enabled.title: indicates whether TLS should be used for client connections to Kafka

truststore.title: if TLS is enabled, the truststore configuration for client connections to Kafka

secretRef.title: if TLS is enabled, details of an existing Kubernetes secret containing the truststore for client connections to Kafka

name.title: if TLS is enabled, the name of an existing Kubernetes secret containing the truststore for client connections to Kafka; blank if no truststore is required

key.title: if TLS is enabled, the name of an existing Kubernetes secret containing the truststore for client connections to Kafka

type.title: if TLS is enabled, the type of the truststore for client connections to Kafka; one of PEM or JKS

password.title: if TLS is enabled, the password for the truststore for client connections to Kafka, if any

sasl.title: SASL configuration for client connection to Kafka

username.title: SASL username for client connection to Kafka

password.title: SASL password for client connection to Kafka

mechanism.title: SASL mechanism for client connection to Kafka

enabled.title: enable/disable SASL for client connection to Kafka

initialAdminUser.title: Configuration for the initial user created with admin permissions

username.title: Username for the initial admin user

password.title: password for the initial admin user; generated if not specified

secretRef.title: Reference to a Kubernetes secret that holds the initial admin user credentials to be used in preference to any provided via username and password

name.title: If specified, the name of an existing secret that contains the initial admin user credentials to be used in preference to any provided via username and password

usernameKey.title: The key name for the secret entry containing the initial admin user's username

passwordKey.title: The key name for the secret entry containing the initial admin user's password

enabled.title: Indicates whether DB bootstrap is enabled as part of installation
Indicates whether Kafka bootstrap is enabled as part of installation

cleanup.title: Specifies whether existing topics with the given prefix should be deleted before trying to create new ones (deletes all existing topics if no prefix is given)

image.title: Configuration for CLI image used for bootstrap

registry.title: CLI image registry; defaults to image.registry

tag.title: CLI default tag; defaults to image.tag

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the bootstrap containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the bootstrap containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the bootstrap containers

nodeSelector.title: node selector for the bootstrap containers

registry.title: crypto worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: crypto worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run DB worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the DB worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level(defaults to logging.level if not specified)

enabled.title: run DB worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the crypto worker containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the crypto worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the crypto worker containers

registry.title: DB worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: DB worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run DB worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the DB worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run DB worker with profiling enabled

salt.title: DB worker salt, defaults to a value randomly-generated on install

passphrase.title: DB worker passphrase, defaults to a value randomly-generated on install

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the DB worker containers.

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the DB worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the DB worker containers

registry.title: flow worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: flow worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run flow worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the flow worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run flow worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the flow worker containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the flow worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the flow worker containers

verifyInstrumentation.title: run flow worker with Quasar's verifyInstrumentation enabled

registry.title: membership worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: membership worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run membership worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the membership worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run membership worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the membership worker containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the membership worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the membership worker containers

registry.title: RPC worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: RPC worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run RPC worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the RPC worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run RPC worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the RPC worker containers.

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the RPC worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the RPC worker containers

type.title: the type for the RPC worker service

externalTrafficPolicy.title: the traffic policy for the RPC worker service

loadBalancerSourceRanges.title: the LoadBalancer source ranges to limit access to the RPC worker service

annotations.title: the annotations for RPC worker service

registry.title: p2p-link-manager worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: p2p-link-manager worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

useStubs.title: Use stubbed crypto processor, membership group reader and group policy provider

enabled.title: run p2p-link-manager worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the p2p-link-manager worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run p2p-link-manager worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the p2p-link-manager worker containers.

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the p2p-link-manager worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the p2p-link-manager worker containers

registry.title: p2p-gateway worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: p2p-gateway worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

enabled.title: run p2p-gateway worker with debug enabled

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the p2p-gateway worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level: one of all, trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, or off; defaults to logging.level if not specified

enabled.title: run p2p-gateway worker with profiling enabled

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the p2pGateway worker containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the p2pGateway worker containers
